subsection.name: SSH
subsection.p: Hearsay is built from a custom Apache Karaf distribution. This means that all the operations available from a default installation of Karaf are available in Hearsay...which includes remote access via SSH to a sandboxed console. The default port for the SSH daemon is 8101 and can be changed by etc/org.apache.karaf.shell.cfg configuration file. Replace "serverName" with the hostname of your server.
